instructions.default:
You are assisting with a major architectural refactor and migration in a React-based monorepo. The upgraded system must support:

- Multi-province operations with hierarchical Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
- Responsive design using Ant Design Grid (Row, Col) and Tailwind CSS
- Bilingual support (Thai default, English optional) via i18n
- Day.js for all date handling
- Ant Design + Tailwind for a modern, themeable UI with full dark mode support
- All UI and logic changes must comply with the design rules defined in /docs/design-system.md

Preserve existing logic and functionalities where applicable. Avoid redundant rewrites. Suggest improvements only where there are clear benefits. Respond with modified files or diffs.
